curam.util.resources

Interface EnvironmentConstants.SMTP

  • Enclosing interface:
    EnvironmentConstants

    public static interface EnvironmentConstants.SMTP
    These settings configure the environment in which the SMTP client element of Curam operates.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String kSMTPConnectionTimeout
      The socket connection timeout value (in seconds) of the mail server.
      static java.lang.String kSMTPHostServer
      The default mail server that is used by Curam.
      static java.lang.String kSMTPServerPort
      The port on which the default mail server is addressed.
      static java.lang.String kSMTPTimeout
      The socket I/O timeout value (in seconds) of the mail server.
